issue.message: Field requires API level 30 (current min is 21): `android.hardware.camera2.CameraCharacteristics#CONTROL_ZOOM_RATIO_RANGE`
issue.errorLine1: CameraCharacteristics.CONTROL_ZOOM_RATIO_RANGE).getUpper();
Thread.sleep(1000);
Thread.sleep(5000);
Thread.sleep(3000);

issue.message: This method should only be accessed from tests or within private scope
